Like millions of other people, I never knew Steve personally.  When I think
of Apple, I think of Steve.  If I had to think of one word to describe him, "Brilliant."  I was shocked to hear of his passing, and I had the feeling
that I lost someone close to me, though that wasnÂ¹t the case.  He built a
great company and he saved a company and made it even Greater.  My heart
goes out to his family, friends, and to all of his Apple family.  You will
be missed Mr. Jobs.
author: Chad
